hero.title: Master Mobile Repair Technology
hero.description: Join GKITI to decode hardware secrets and software mastery. Certified training for the next gen of technicians.

features.hardware_desc: Level 4 repair training covering micro-soldering, double-decker CPU reballing, and schematic analysis.
features.software_desc: Master modern security protocols. iCloud bypass, FRP unlock, and EMMC programming mastery.
features.certification_desc: We provide BTEB certification recognized internationally. Bangladesh Technical Education Board.

why_gkiti.title: Why GKITI?
why_gkiti.description: Elite infrastructure met with cutting-edge curriculum. We don't just teach repair; we engineer careers.
